product.longDescription: These flavorful specialty onions mature early and hold well. Purplette is a glossy rich burgundy, transforming to a nice pastel pink when cooked or pickled. Can be harvested at golf ball size or very young as baby bunching onions with purple pearl ends. Best at 40° latitude and higher. Avg. 120,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 1,000 seeds.

Purplette Onion Seed

Purplette Onion Seed

Product ID:499.11499

These flavorful specialty onions mature early and hold well. Purplette is a glossy rich burgundy, transforming to a nice pastel pink when cooked or pickled. Can be harvested at golf ball size or very young as baby bunching onions with purple pearl ends. Best at 40° latitude and higher. Avg. 120,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 1,000 seeds.
